title: Alik Bahshi
author: Alik Bahshi
content: Alik BakhshiThe Empire of Lies and Nebenzya's "fighting mosquitoes"             I have already written about Russia as the Empire of Lies and its main liar, in the person of the permanent president, Putin. (1) So, the permanent representative of Russia to the UN Security Council, Mr. biological weapons, namely mosquitoes infected with pathogenic microbes, which, it must be understood, are trained, because they selectively bite only Russian soldiers. I can imagine what a shock the members of the Security Council were at that moment in deathly silence, who accepted this nonsense, and what a laughter burst out after leaving the meeting room. Nebenzya probably forgot that in front of him are not "Putin's old women", but people with a normal psyche. Nonsense from Nebenzya testifies to two things: how great the zombification of the citizens of Russia is and how deeply the lie has penetrated into their consciousness. (2)1. The Empire of Lies and her and her main liar. https://alikbahshi.livejournal.com/22317.html2. Lies are the main bond of Russia. 04/14/20. https://alikbahshi.livejournal.com/52550.html01.03.2023

comments.author: Alik Bahshi
comments.body: Nebenzya once again showed that lies are the hallmark of Putin's Russia.
